#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	long long i,k,t,ans=0,first,second;
	string x;
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>x,k=x.size(),first=second=ans=0;
		for(i=0;i<k;i++)
		{
			if(x[i]=='L')
				ans+=second,first++;
			if(x[i]=='O')
				second+=first;
		}
		printf("%lld\n",ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
